item.name: [0204ALL00ALL]PRO_CAL_04_ALL_ALL_ALL_NSTOUEN_SGPCETVPEC_SGAPIL2_PRC16_GDCORC016
item.description:
Aim : Check the payload and response of dmd_calcul (Oracle/WM exchanges)
o  0 - Check of PCE, APIL and GDC
o  1 - Check of FGA(no paylod created for FGA) and ZQG


PCE : SGPCETVPEC
APIL : SGAPIL2
GDC : GDCORC16
FGA : NSTOUEN
ZQG : PRC16

exec: if ( tests["Delete Point Data FGA"] && tests["Delete Point Data ZQG"] && tests["Delete Point Data PCE"] && tests["Delete Point Data APIL"] && tests["Delete Point Data GDC"] && tests["Delete Acq_Fga Data"] && tests["Delete Acq_Fga Data"]){
tests["Check SOURCE_PROCESSID"] = payload.find(function (d) { return d.$.NAME == "SOURCE_PROCESSID";}).$.VALUE == sourceProcessid;
tests["Check SOURCE_PROCESSID"] = payload.find(function (d) { return d.$.NAME == "SOURCE_PROCESSID";}).$.VALUE == sourceProcessid;
tests["Check SOURCE_PROCESSID"] = payload.find(function (d) { return d.$.NAME == "SOURCE_PROCESSID";}).$.VALUE == sourceProcessid;
